subject: Missing Haptics from Order #SSN4661
description_text:
Hello,

I am writing to inform you that the order I recently received is missing
the haptics component, which was included in this order (#SSN4661). The
tracking does not show any additional deliveries anticipated at this time.
I believe the order also included the U-Shaped mounting brackets which have
also not arrived yet.

Could you please advise on how we can resolve this and ensure the missing
component is shipped to me?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Michael

-- 
*************************************************
Michael Reichenberger Ph.D.
email: mcriech@gmail.com
Tel: 316:209:9353www.reichenbergers.com
*************************************************

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Reichenberger, JSELB1215369036YQ Hello, this is the logistics information for the vibrator. Please check it.

Thank you,
This is the same tracking number for the remainder of the order which was
already delivered.
I can only see the hand-off through customs to the US carrier (FedEx)
https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELB1215369036YQ
The FedEx tracking number,
https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=887119036782&trkqual=12029~887119036782~FDEG
, indicates the package was delivered, suggesting there is not another
package.
The haptics are still missing.

Thank you,
Michael

-- 
*************************************************
Michael Reichenberger Ph.D.
email: mcriech@gmail.com
Tel: 316:209:9353www.reichenbergers.com
*************************************************
